effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

short_effect.black-white: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.black-white: Boulders are hurled at the target. It also lowers the target’s Speed by preventing its movement.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Boulders are hurled at the target. It also lowers the target’s Speed by preventing its movement.
